quote: The mind that turns ever outward Will have no end to craving. Only the mind turned inward Will find a still-point of peace. – Ming-Dao Deng
fact: The shortest war in history was between Zanzibar and England in 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
joke: A book just fell on my head. I only have my shelf to blame.
